hero_notes: Flight - 20in per turn, ignoring any grounded models or obstacles. May choose to land on an object or piece of terrain, or hover in place. When you do hover you float 15in above the tabletop.

hero_major_power_list.description: You shoot blasts of power (concussive force, cosmic energy, electricity, etc.) from your eyes or hands.  You can make 30in ranged attacks at +2D[1].  Your blasts are physical in nature and inflict Body Damage

hero_minor_power_list.description: You can fly up to 20in per turn, ignoring any grounded models or obstacles in your path. You may choose to land on an object or piece of terrain, or hover in place. When you do hover you float 15in above the tabletop.
notes: Flight - 20in per turn, ignoring any grounded models or obstacles. May choose to land on an object or piece of terrain, or hover in place. When you do hover you float 15in above the tabletop.

hero_minor_power_list.description: You are super-tough! Gain +1D on all defense checks from Body damaging attacks and +1D on KO checks.
